file_content.text: What a day! The thrill of the hunt, the heat of battle.
So, have the Sith finally decided to partake in the slaughter? There's serious killing to be done out there.
Mandalorians follow the bloodshed, so when the Empire orders an entire planet purged... well, it's been a busy month.
The Empire wants the Cathar wiped out. Trouble is, those furry critters have been bartering with the Nikto, trading land for protection.
The Cathar will have to fend for themselves now.
Word's already out. The jungle is apparently littered with the bodies of slain Nikto.
Morgukai training didn't prepare them for the likes of you.
The Morgukai lived up to their reputation.
It was a good fight.
You got that right.
Wish I could have seen it.
Now for my reward.
Of course.
I contacted the Imperials for your payment as soon as I heard about your killing spree. Here--you've earned this.
Enjoy yourself out there.
So, have you come to join your comrades in the hunt? There's serious killing to be done out there.
I hope you Imperials are ready to get your hands dirty. There's serious killing to be done out there.
So, are you here for the bounty, too? There's serious killing to be done out there.
How do I refuse the promise of violence?
Sounds like fun.
The Sith are neither reckless butchers nor common thugs. Remember that.
Show some respect.
Of course. But surely even a Sith can appreciate a good fight when it comes along?
If it's a worthwhile target, I might be interested.
Possibly.
A Mandalorian who likes to fight? I'm shocked.
Typical Mandalorian.
Explain yourself.
The Nikto are brutal. Cunning fighters, all of them. But the best of them are a cut above.
The Nikto's Morgukai warriors are among the deadliest in the galaxy. They train to kill Force users and can take a normal man down as easy as breathing.
If these Morgukai are so powerful, why aren't they more well-known?
Never heard of them.
Aren't that many. Or could be because people haven't faced them and lived.
We'll see about that.
Now that's the kind of gumption a warrior needs if she wants any worthwhile heads mounted on her wall.
Now that's the kind of gumption a warrior needs if he wants any worthwhile heads mounted on his wall.
Let the Imperial troops deal with them.
That's why we have an army.
Would you send children to kill a rancor?
Imps have grown tired of licking their wounds, hired us to deal with the Nikto.
I'm sure even a Sith's power would be put to the test against the Morgukai. Interested in joining us?
There's spoils aplenty for a capable mercenary. Interested?
Only the most skilled Mandalorians have ever bested the Morgukai. Are you with us?
I imagine even the Empire's best and brightest would be tested out there. Interested in joining us?
There's plenty of spoils to go around. Interested in joining us?
Let's see how powerful these Morgukai really are.
Sounds like a worthy foe.
The Morgukai will come to fear the Sith.
I'll show them terror.
I'm always up for a challenge... if it's profitable.
This is what I do.
The Nikto won't even see me coming.
This will be quick.
That's the spirit!
If the Empire wants them dead, that's reason enough for me.
It needs to be done.
Fair enough. What motivates you isn't my concern.
The Imperials are offering a reward for every Nikto killed, plus a hefty bonus for bringing in the Morgukai's cortosis staffs.
You make it back alive, I'll see you're paid for your kills.
Not really. [Refuse quest]
Suit yourself. More for me.
Those Nikto are tenacious.
